testcase.name: Successful completion of purchase order
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Successful completion of purchase order Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 6.757s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.152s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.045s And User adds item 'fleece jacket' to the cart ... passed in 1.041s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.064s And User proceeds to checkout ... passed in 1.036s And User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Doe', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.102s And User continues to overview and verify total amount as well as finishes the order ... passed in 2.114s Then User should see the order confirmation page with message Thank you for your order! ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
